metadata.title: USN-4521-1 -- pam_tacplus vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that pam_tacplus did not properly manage shared secrets if DEBUG loglevel and journald are used. A remote attacker could use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4521-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libpam-tacplus - 1.3.8-2+deb8u1build0.18.04.1 No subscription required
